data.title: Gerald Brooks School of Leadership
data.meta_description: Gerald Brooks School of Leadership is a Bible College to help students become lifelong learners, grow to their fullest capacity, and develop the skills to lead effectively
data.text:
A qualified application includes:

Student must be 18 years old or older

Student has submitted a completed School of Leadership Enrollment Application along with:

Full payment of application fee ($10)

Proof of graduation (High School Diploma or GED)â€‹

Student must attend a mandatory student orientation.

Statement of Non- Discrimination

Gerald Brooks School of Leadership is an educational Christian Institution that admits students of any race, color, national and ethnic origin to all the rights, privileges, programs, and activities made available to the students of the organization. GBSL does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national or ethnic origin in administration of its educational policies, admission policies, and other programs.
